Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.network.tcp

Class ServerTCPNetworkManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.network.tcp.ServerTCPNetworkManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerNetworkManager
public class ServerTCPNetworkManager extends Object implements ServerNetworkManager
Server network manager for TCP. This class is responsible for managing the server-side network operations.
